io.github.trulyfree.easyaspi.lib.dl

Class DownloadHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.trulyfree.easyaspi.lib.dl.DownloadHandler

  • public class DownloadHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for all downloading actions taken by EasyAsPi. You do not have to use this if you don't want to. :P
    Since:
    v0.0.1-alpha
    Author:
    vtcakavsmoace

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The activity which owns this download handler.

      Buffer size for all downloads.
      private static int TIMEOUT
      Timeout for all connections.

        Downloads an item and returns it as a String.
        Parameters:
        callback - Callback for progress updates on the download.
        urlString - The URL of this download.
        Returns:
        content The content of the target URL as a String.

      • download

                     java.io.OutputStream output,
                     @Nullable
                     Callback callback,
                     @NonNull
                     java.lang.String urlString)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Downloads an item and writes it to an output stream during the download.
        Parameters:
        output - The output stream to write to.
        callback - Callback for progress updates on the download.
        urlString - The URL of this download.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the download fails.

      • getDownloadStream

        public java.io.InputStream getDownloadStream(@NonNull
                                             java.lang.String urlString)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a readable (buffered) input stream that downloads may be read from.
        Parameters:
        urlString - The URL of this download.
        Returns:
        downloadStream A readable (buffered) input stream from which to read the download.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the connection fails.
